name: 肥啾大冒险
description:
"Fat Adventure" is a Q-epi-pixel game that combines casual and cool-like game-like gameplay with cute fat-collecting elements to create a lively and fun game atmosphere.

[World view]
★ On a continent full of food, there is a group of greedy fat people who follow the "everything in the world, only the food and love can not live up to" life attitude through the "real incense" every day.

[game features]
★Q Meng big food, fat attack
★ Easy to get started, experience refreshing
★The game takes a short time, accumulates short-term happiness, and is fast addicted
★Multi-career choice, combined with basic gameplay, enrich the game process
Players can choose characters in the game and then play the game. The core gameplay is eliminated, so you need to eat more small fats and expand your group to eliminate desserts.
There are various numbers above the dessert, you want to eliminate the need to eat more fat, so you need to keep collecting more fat.
You need to decide if you can eliminate all the numbers and avoid failure.
This game is an infinite level. It will become more and more difficult in the later stages.
